post.body: glad you had a good birthday weekend matey! :)
Facebook. I'm no damn punk.
I too was forced to watch this by the girl. Mean times.
what be ye building? I'm hoping it's a robot but I know it's really a car... ;)
Half-day! slacker!
Trick ;)
urrkk hungover pain times// kn
the day of the office Christmas celebration has arrived... drinks then film, then drinks and food, then perhaps shenanigans ;)
I've seen The Day The Earth Stood Still now... I want to be kinder as there were a lot of parts that I really liked but it failed overall.
needed large can of red bull this morning... urk...
ok Versions and Beanstalk are friends now, good times :D
hmmm, creating a Beanstalk repository on a whim from the Versions link has not gone smoothly. Versions hates my new account... :(
I'm not ashamed to admit that the toy http://www.wreck.devisland.net/ga/ going round yesterday made me want to play with genetic algorithms
jQuery and php this morning I think, the AS3 can wait for the afternoon.
gonna start the revamp of the old portfolio site today! The drama!
back at work after a day off sick, back to working on porn. Who knew.
so incredibly lazy this weekend, didn't actually leave the house... oh well, I have an iPod touch now :)
saw Quantum of Solace last night: v enjoyable :) but basically a little worse in every aspect than Casino Royale so overall it's not as good
I find generatus lacking.
I have survived birthday 27. Just about.
will be heading back to Reading and leaving the 'stone tomorrow
Merry Christmas! or y'know: have a good thursday!
started playing Urban Dead last night. oh dear
i'm gonna work like a demon today
